room_title: Escape room "Leonardtown Manor" by Escape Rooms Southern Maryland in California
room_description: Your family has told stories for generations that all of its bad luck and failures could be traced back to your great great great Aunt. They believe that she was attempting to change her fortune by delving into the dark arts. Her and your great great great Uncle lived in this home up until the night they disappeared exactly 100 years ago today. You have recently inherited this manor and through sheer luck or destiny you have shown up to inspect it at one hour prior to midnight on the centennial of their sudden disappearance. Legend has it that if you are able to release the curse, you and your familyâ€™s lineage will be saved. If not, you may end up like your Aunt and Uncle.
